title: Plot Release Highlights 1 2 0
description: This tutorial is a step-by-step guide to learn about the new features of scikit-learn 1.2. Scikit-learn is a popular machine learning library in Python that provides a range of tools for machine learning, including classification, regression, clustering, and dimensionality reduction. The latest release of scikit-learn 1.2 has several new features and improvements, including pandas output with the set_output API, interaction constraints in histogram-based gradient boosting trees, and more.
